definition: white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera
erhua variant of 小白臉|小白脸[xiao3 bai2 lian3]

sentences.english: Do not believe the sweet words of that fair-faced man.
sentences.chinese: 不要相信那個小白臉的甜言蜜語。

sentences.english: I think you may deign to marry me. I don't want to be an Adonis.
sentences.chinese: 你要屈尊下嫁，我可不想當小白臉兒。

sentences.english: Who is that, you don't blather .
sentences.chinese: 誰是那小白臉，你可別亂說。

sentences.english: That dragon lady have three gigolo under her husbands nose.
sentences.chinese: 那位女強人當着丈夫的面，公開有三位小白臉。

sentences.english: How do you know a gigolo ?
The little white-faced account of her cheap, dingy places to escape.
sentences.chinese: 那小白臉佔了她的便宜，也灰溜溜地逃走了。

sentences.english: We"ll go to prison, and you"ll be someones bitch.
sentences.chinese: 我們會進監獄，你會成爲某人的小白臉。

sentences.english: She ran away with a small white face.
sentences.chinese: 她和一個小白臉一起跑了。

sentences.english: They quite often have their own "boytoys".
sentences.chinese: 而且通常她們也有自己的“小白臉”。

sentences.english: Is this small pearly face, injury he this big half month all and the wife is in Cold War.
sentences.chinese: 就是這個小白臉，害得他這大個半月都跟老婆在冷戰。

sentences.english: That dragon lady told her husband she had three gigolos to his face.
sentences.chinese: 那位女強人當着她丈夫的面，公開有三位小白臉。

sentences.english: Welcome to the coal mine, canary.
We'll go to prison, and you'll be someone'
sentences.chinese: 我們會進監獄，你會成爲某人的小白臉。

to throw oneself in sb's arms/to throw oneself at sb
